title: Context Generator
description: Validates .agenstra/ context and transforms to tool-specific configs (Cursor, OpenCode, GitHub Copilot). Defaults to all targets when target is not set; writes output under outputDir.

project.description: Nx project name. .agenstra/ is expected at the project root.

path.description: Directory that contains .agenstra/. Used when --project is not set.

target.description: Target tools to generate config for. When not set, all targets (cursor, opencode, github-copilot) are generated. Output is written under outputDir.

outputDir.description: Base output directory for transformed configs (e.g. outputDir/.cursor/, outputDir/.opencode/, outputDir/.github/).

dryRun.description: Only validate; do not run transform or write files.
